law.text: Eggs offered for sale as graded eggs shall conform to the standards prescribed in administrative regulations adopted by the department. These standards shall conform to the federal standards promulgated by USDA and FDA for grading eggs for sale.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 36, sec. 3, effective June 16, 1960. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 121, sec. 9.
